AssessmentDefinition.name: AssessmentDefinition
AssessmentDefinition.description: Represents the definition of an assessment including details such as the last revised date and purpose.

ApprovalDateTime.description: The date and time when the assessment was approved by the publisher.

DisplayType.description: Specifies the display format for questions in the assessment for the end-user.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date when the assessment takes effect.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date until the assessment is in effect.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date when the record was last referenced.

LastRevisedDateTime.description: The date and time when the assessment was last revised.

LastViewedDate.description: The date when the record was last viewed.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the record.

PerformerType.description: Specifies the type of performer that can record responses to the assessment.

PublisherId.description: The organization or individual that published the assessment.
